skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Proficient in crafting dynamic and engaging user interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to deliver intuitive front-end experiences.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Skilled in developing and maintaining robust back-end systems, including RESTful APIs and microservices, ensuring seamless integration and efficient data processing within complex healthcare environments.

skills.title: Database
skills.description: Skilled in designing and optimizing databases, leveraging SQL and MongoDB to ensure efficient data storage and retrieval for scalable applications.

skills.title: Web Development
skills.description: Proficient in end-to-end web development, utilizing a diverse stack including React, Spring Boot, and various front-end and back-end technologies to deliver dynamic and user-friendly web applications.
